rear.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: at or near the back of something, especially a vehicle
rear.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: the rear door of the car
rear.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the part of your body which you sit on
rear.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to look after a person or animal until they are fully grown
rear.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Itâ€™s a good place to rear young children.
The birds have been successfully reared in captivity.
rear.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: if an animal rears, it rises up to stand on its back legs
rear.translation[2].definitions[1].examp: The horse reared and threw me off.
rear.translation[2].definitions[2].defin: if something rears up, it appears in front of you and often seems to be leaning over you in a threatening way
rear.translation[2].definitions[2].examp: A large rock, almost 200 feet high, reared up in front of them.
